attributes.action: Take immediate steps to stop homelessness using NEW funding for expert agencies.
attributes.additional_details:
An estimated 597 homeless people died in England and Wales last year, according to official @ONS figures. A rise of 24% over five years.

These deaths are a source of national shame:
attributes.background:

These deaths are a source of national shame:

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "expert agencies".

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231149
